item.title: Exporting Proxmox VMs
item.description: For a long time I have been thinking about replacing my server’s proxmox install with vanilla Debian or CentOS, mostly for learning purposes. I would first setup zfs on the new system and import my existing data pools. Then, I would use either a system like ovrit or just plain kvm/lxc to run my VMs and containers. In order to do this though… I have to first figure out how export my containers and VMs running in Proxmox.
